column4: hi folks.  this might sound stupid, but after upgrading to herdy I cannot login with my user accout... the password seems to have reset itself or something...  anyway how can i reset account passwords from the root login?
im workin in the terminal at the moment
im logged in as root thats not the problem, its my user account
yeah i know dystopianray :)
passwd user was what i needed thanks everyone
wireless Chillum ?
I'm trying to set up my ADSL modem
whats the make and model Chillum
Speedtouch 330
ah right one of those. you had it working under linux before Chillum ?
Nope, just my Windows XP OS i'm afraid.
First time with Linux/ Used Unix before at uni
I've tried https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UsbAdslModem/SpeedTouch but I don't know if i'm doing anything right.
did you get the revision Chillum ?
revision?
Sorry, not sure what you mean there.
stick this command into the terminal  grep -B 1 "THOMSON" /proc/bus/usb/devices
Funnily enough, I tried that. Don't get anything back. Don't think it worked!
what did it say Chillum ? must be something?
I don't quite remember exactly what it said.
...i'll go back and try again and note down the exact message. Back in a little while.
any chance you can do it again Chillum
The mesage was that the directory did not exist!
